EmailTemplate.description: TAD Your Travel Pack Is Ready
EmailTemplate.name: TADQF Travel Pack
EmailTemplate.subject: Get ready to Travel! Your TripADeal Itinerary is ready for order {!Travefy_Document_POE__c.order_number_text__c}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
.
Get ready to travel! Hi {!Travefy_Document_POE__c.trip_purchaser_first_name__c}, Your travel itinerary for {!Travefy_Document_POE__c.option_title__c} is ready!
Click the link below to open your itinerary. Your itinerary includes flight details as well as any other important information relevant to your holiday.
VIEW YOUR TRIP HERE
Click the button above to also: Get the Mobile App or Download a Printable PDF
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We hope you have an incredible trip!
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
.
